foundryvtt-dnd5e-wildshape.position.name: Token Position
foundryvtt-dnd5e-wildshape.position.hint: Which side of the token should the icons appear on?
foundryvtt-dnd5e-wildshape.playerActivat: Allow players to toggle their own torches and lights.
foundryvtt-dnd5e-wildshape.checkAvailabi: Perform a check to see if the character has torches in his inventory or can cast light spells.
foundryvtt-dnd5e-wildshape.consumeItem.h: Actually removes one item from the inventory when the light is lit.
foundryvtt-dnd5e-wildshape.dmAsPlayer.hi: If set, the DM checks the availability of light sources fot the selected player and uses his/her inventory.
foundryvtt-dnd5e-wildshape.forceUseMacro: If true you use the macro instead che normal code
